section.title: Data format
section.para: File format is plain ASCII, with fields delimited by tabstops, not spaces. Fields are separated by tabs so that spaces are permitted within a field. The file suffix should be .txt
No field may be left blank. Four asterisks should be used to designate untyped locus data or unknown descriptive data.
There should be 3 lines of header information on a population file.
The three lines are as follows:

programlistingco.programlisting: labcode method ethnic contin collect latit longit complex USAERL SSOP Irish Europe Dublin 30 deg 350 deg 1 populat id a_1 a_2 c_1 c_2 b_1 b_2 tap1_1 tap1_2

formalpara.title: Line 2
formalpara.para: Data under headings in line 1 are filled in on line 2 as follows:

callout.para: The method should be one of the following:
callout.literallayout: SSOP RLS SBT SSP RSCA MS (this is for PCR/gel sizing for microsatellites) RFLP SSCP Other
callout.para: The ethnic field may contain practically anything, but the contin field should contain one of the following geographic regions:
callout.literallayout: North-Africa Sub-Saharan-Africa North-East-Asia South-East-Asia South-West-Asia Australia Europe North-America Oceania South-America Other
callout.para: The collect field is for where the data was collected, latit and longit are for the latitude and longitude (approximately) of origin, and complex should be entered as a zero.

formalpara.title: Line 3
formalpara.para: There is one more line which contains the headers for the columns of genotype data.

callout.para: populat should contain a name for the population and id should contain a sample id.
There should be two header labels for each locus, giving the name of the locus, in lower case please, followed by an underscore and a one (1) or a two (2), so that each column name is unique.
From line 4 onwards, the file should contain genotype data, all tab-separated, with no blanks and a string of four asterisks indicating untyped loci.

VERY IMPORTANT, a homozygote should include entries for both alleles i.e., DRB1 0407 should have 0407 entered TWICE, the other allele should NEVER be left blank, indicated by a dash, or in any way assumed, otherwise they cannot be differentiated from ambiguous typing results.
There should be no trailing blank lines at the end of a file.

listitem.para: You log in to our server via [s]ftp and upload the text files, alerting us by e-mail.
You alert us by e-mail when new data is available, and we log in to your server via [s]ftp and download the text files.
